page.title: 12HOMES IN MENZIESHILL,DUNDEE.
page.content: In our area we are lucky enough to have many different types of houses, for example;semi_detached,Multies,Tene ments.Near_by there is a private estate called {Gowrie Park. One of the older houses in Gowrie Park is called {Margall Denbank.}It was built in the early{19th.century.}.It used to be called a{station house. In{Menzieshill}there is a children's home which is called{Strathcarron {House;}it was opened in{1969}.It has a total of 7 staff and can hold 12 children.The children can stay there until they are{18}years old then they can go their own way. In{Menzieshill}there is a total of{64 {Sheltered } houses ,they were opened in{1979},the oldest person they have living in one is a{87}year old lady, there are{10}couples living there.You can get these houses at 60 years old.
